findings.title: L02 - State Variables could be Declared Constant
findings.description: State variables can be declared as constant using the constant keyword to ensure that their values cannot be changed after they have been set, which decreases gas consumption of the corresponding transaction.

findings.title: L04 - Conformance to Solidity Naming Conventions
findings.description: The contract does not follow the Solidity style guide for writing clean and consistent Solidity code.

findings.title: L16 - Validate Variable Setters
findings.description: The contract performs operations on variables that have been configured with user-supplied input without proper checks for zero values, which can lead to problems when the contract is executed.
